attributes.action: Make more parent and toddler spaces in all car parks
attributes.background: It’s down right frustrating that there is little to no parking for parents in any car park. There needs to be more in every car park!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The layout of car parks is the responsibility of local authorities or private companies. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could start a new petition, asking the UK Government or Parliament to require local authorities to provide parent and toddler spaces, if that is what you would like to happen.
